THE TOBACCO INSTITUTE

1075 | STREET. NORTHWEST lORACE R. KORNEGAY
WASHINGTON. DC 20008 Prosident

 

   

September 26, 1980

TO: Committee of Counsel

FROM: Horace R. Kornegay

Attached for your information is a status report on the
Nonsmoker Insurance Premiums - State Mutual Manuscript.

H.R.K.

Attachment

4ESTEETO

summary: Horace R. Kornegay: Status report on the Nonsmoker Insurance Premiums - State Mutual Manuscript. The report was sent on September 26, 1980 to the Committee of Counsel at the ToBACCO Institute in Washington, D.C. Horace: The status report is attached for your information.
